name: Hovercraft Mania
description:
Hovercraft Mania is a hovercraft time trial game. The goal is simple: try to set the fastest lap time possible.

Features

  • Time trial mode
  • Saving player records
  • 3 tracks with reversed versions
  • Keyboard and controller support
    • Supported controllers: XInput controllers, Dualshock 4, Switch Pro Controller.

Credits

  • Strafe Productions - Programming, game design, art, track models
  • Alexandr z - Hovercraft model
  • Unity Technologies -  Terrain textures
  • InspectorJ -  Air brake sound (edited)
  • Kristian Grundström - Engine sounds
  • Music from Mega Music Collection Royalty Free Bundle
